articles.title: India vs Australia Highlights, 3rd T20I: Ruturaj Gaikwad's Ton In Vain As Glenn Maxwell Unleashes Mayhem To Beat India - NDTV Sports
articles.description: IND vs AUS Highlights, 3rd T20I: Glenn Maxwell's powerful century guided Australia to victory against India in a thrilling run-chase in the third T20I match
articles.content: India vs Australia Highlights, 3rd T20I:Glenn Maxwell's powerful century guided Australia to victory against India in a thrilling run-chase in the third T20I match. Chasing 223, Australia started off… [+467 chars]
